Posts.EditableText: Hey! How do I make my character start the game with certain wearable objects already on?
Posts.HTML: Hey! How do I make my character start the game with certain wearable objects already on?

Posts.EditableText: If I'm not mistaken, clothing being worn is just marked by a Boolean attribute on the item itself called "worn" (lower case). So just start the game with the attribute "worn" as True, and you should be good!
Posts.HTML: If I'm not mistaken, clothing being worn is just marked by a Boolean attribute on the item itself called "worn" (lower case). So just start the game with the attribute "worn" as True, and you should be good!

Posts.EditableText:
Put this in the start script:


(In this example, there is an object named "jacket".)
```
WearGarment(jacket)
```
